summary:
Adds a spell which summons a chest to store objects.  However, a guardian is also summoned.  This guardian is hostile, and will need to be defeated or evaded to access the chest.
The spell can be purchased at the Riverwood Trader.

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!BETA!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
descriptionHtml:
**********************************************************BETA************************************************************************

This mod needs to be tested for difficulty.  The chest only stays in place for 6 game minutes, so the spell can be used relatively rapidly for testing.  The value in the release will be at least 30 game minutes.  

The chest seems a bit finicky.  It can take between 5-45 seconds to appear.  And it is likely to not appear in tight areas.  Outside or large rooms work best.  

Please comment on whether the guardians are too weak or difficult, or if there is anything else to improve on. 

*******************************************************************************************************************************************

Adds a spell which summons a chest to store objects.  However, a guardian is also summoned.  This guardian is hostile, and will need to be defeated or evaded to access the chest.
The spell can be purchased at the Riverwood Trader.

Copy of the Read Me


~ ~ ~ Infinite Storage ~ ~ ~

Created by DraconBlade (Steam)/BlackLink16 (Skyrim Nexus)

===========
Description
===========

The spell will summon a chest to the player.  The chest also will come
with a guardian, either to defeat or run from.

=========
ChangeLog
=========
v0.1 (2013/03/11)
- Initial version.

============
Requirements
============

No requirements other than Skyrim.

============
Installation
============

1. Extract the files to Skyrim\\Data
2. Activate InfiniteStorage.esp

==================
In-Game Activation
==================

Buy the spelltome at the Riverwood Trader.

=======
Credits
=======

Creation Kit Wiki:
http://www.creationkit.com/

===============
Licensing/Legal
===============

Please contact me before redistributing.
author: BlackLink16
